'''Donald Swann''' ([[30 September|September 30]], [[1923]]â€“[[23 March|March 23]], [[1994]]) recorded various songs related to [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s works in ''[[The Road Goes Ever On, A Song Cycle]]''. 

He was previously associated with wheelchair-bound Michael Flanders, and performed many times as "Flanders & Swann", singing their humorous and witty songs, such as "The Hippopotamus" and "I'm a Gnu (spelt G-N-U)"
